physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 9 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten signatures on the front of the photograph: ''Elizabeth Feltner, Prin. and Helen Exley Knight.'' Written on the photograph: ''JANUARY CLASS 1925. TELLER SCHOOL, DENVER, COLO: - ALEX: MARTIN PHOTO-R.'' Typed below the photograph: ''Henry M. Teller School.'' Handwritten signatures on the back of the photograph: ''Lizzie K. Blackmore, Grace S. Zirkle, Josephine C. Engelhardt, Maude B. Porter, Carrie Sauer, Lela McCoy, Celia O. Peterson, Caroline E. Glage, Janice Ruth Porter, Jane Schayer, Frances Annetta Robertson, Marjorie Firebaugh, Irving Isaacson, Edith Rose Smirnoff, [illegible], Teller School, 1925, #238.''

mods.abstract: A group of students posed with their teacher in front of Henry M. Teller Elementary School located at 1150 Garfield Street, Denver, Colorado. The following students signed the back of the photograph: Lizzie K. Blackmore, Grace S. Zirkle, Josephine C. Engelhardt, Maude B. Porter, Carrie Sauer, Lela McCoy, Celia O. Peterson, Caroline E. Glage, Janice Ruth Porter, Jane Schayer, Frances Annetta Robertson, Marjorie Firebaugh, Irving Isaacson, Edith Rose Smirnoff. Elizabeth Feltner, Prin. and Helen Exley Knight signed the front of the photograph.
